Text:
My many thanks to u griffie for having such an old classic still available for us.  Once I have this D/L-ed I will keep it up for a week or so as a seed.

   I am curious as to what " S T F U " might mean?,
and am I correct in thinking it is not such a nice thing ?

Dear God... I just got done watching this... truly as FANTASTIC as I remembered it!! even got a little watery-eyed towards the end... 

This is truly a magnificent share! Cant thank you enough Griffie !!
